articles.title: Talks held between Kim Yong Nam and Li Peng
articles.content:
DPRK delegation welcomed in Beijing
    Beijing, June 3 (KCNA) -- A ceremony for welcoming the DPRK delegation led by Kim Yong Nam, President of the presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the  DPRK, was held at the Great Hall of the People in Beijing  this afternoon.
   National flags of the DPRK and China were hoisted at the Great Hall of the People.   
Present at the welcoming ceremony were Li Peng, chairman  of the standing committee of the National People's Congress of the PRC= Li Lanqing, vice-premier of the State Council= He Chunlin, secretary general of the standing committee of the National People's Congress= Tang Jiaxuan, Minister of Foreign Affairs= Dai Bingguo, head of the international liaison department of the central committee of the Communist Party of China= Shi Guangsheng, Minister of Foreign Trade and Economic Cooperation= Wan Yongxiang, Chinese ambassador E.P. to Korea= Lu Congmin, deputy secretary general of the NPC standing committee= Qian Shugen, deputy chief of the general staff of the Chinese People's Liberation Army= and other officials concerned.   
   Members of the DPRK delegation exchanged greetings with senior Chinese officials.
   Kim Yong Nam and Hong Song Nam received bunches of flowers from Chinese children.
   The national anthems of the DPRK and China were played.
   Kim Yong Nam, together with Li Peng, reviewed a guard of honor of the three services of the Chinese People's Liberation Army.

articles.title: Committee to remember Kim Il Sung formed
Foreign guests help farmers
articles.content:
Committee to remember Kim Il Sung formed
    Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- The committee of Democratic Congo to remember the great leader President Kim Il Sung was formed on May 28.   The national chairman of the National Movement of the Genuine Lumumbist Combatants of Democratic Congo was elected chairman of the committee.   He said in an inaugural meeting that nearly five years have elapsed since the President, the great sun of the humankind in the 20th century, passed away. The exploits performed by him for human history will  shine for ever generation after generation, he noted.   The meeting set the period from May 28 to July 10  as days to remember him and decided to organize multifarious events during the period.

articles.content:
Foreign guests help farmers
   Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- Indonesian ambassador to Korea Buchari Effendi and embassy officials visited the Korea-Indonesia Friendship Yaksu Co-op Farm  to help it in farming on June 2.   The guests weeded a corn-field with farmers. At a break, they sang songs of two countries and talked with farmers, deepening friendship.
Meanwhile, Christian Lemaire, Resident Coordinator of the UN and representative of the UNDP here, and mission officials helped the Ponghwa Co-op Farm in farming on May 31.

Greetings to Cuban Foreign Minister
   Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister of the DPRK Paek Nam Sun sent a message of greetings to Pelipe Perez Roque upon his appointment as Foreign Minister of Cuba.   The message expressed the belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two peoples and countries would further develop, and sincerely wished him  success in his responsible work.

articles.title: Pak Song Chol meets Lao delegation
articles.content:
DPRK delegation arrives in Beijing
   Beijing, June 3 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea led by Kim Yong Nam, President of the presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, arrived in Beijing this morning.  It was met at the airport by vice-chairman of the standing committee of the National People's Congress of the PRC Jiang Chunyun, Chinese ambassador to Korea Wan Yongxiang, deputy secretary-general of the standing committee of the National People's Congress of the PRC Lu Congmin, assistant foreign minister Wu Donghua, officials concerned, DPRK ambassador to China Ju Chang Jun and embassy officials.
